overview: Sexual fantasies hit the airwaves, as a radio talk show has callers phoning in their sexual soirees. Whether it's a nymphomaniac nurse (Asa Akira), a sexy young girl seducing her mom's boyfriend or a young man's tale of his "soon to be" stepmom's seduction - the action is non-stop! If you're ready to get turned on, grab your knob and tune in to On the Air!
tagline: Call and tell your dirtiest stories...
title: On the Air
